Room.Name: Dark Jungle Road
Room.ShortDescription: The road has become dark and narrow as you get deeper into the jungle.
Room.LongDescription: A soft chanting can be heard in the distance, mingling with the sound of the surf even further away. A dead goat is impaled on a stout pole by the side of the road, and chicken feathers make a necklace for the hapless animal. Do you recall that voodoo doctors often use such grotesque symbols to keep out the unbelievers?
